H0.text: Who in the Old Testament is the father of King David. Saul

H1.text: Who in the Old Testament is the father of King David. Samuel

H2.text: Who in the Old Testament is the father of King David. Boaz

H3.text: Who in the Old Testament is the father of King David. JESSE

A4.text: Jesse is a figure described in the Hebrew Bible as the father of David, who became the king of the Israelites.

A5.text: Jesse was the son of Obed and the grandson of Ruth and of Boaz.
